pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, November 17, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Bali, Indonesia

8:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Bangkok, Thailand.

Ngurah Rai International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Bangkok, Thailand

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Bangkok, Thailand.

Don Mueang International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Chile, Gabriel Boric.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the end of the meeting

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Thailand, Prayut Chan-o-cha.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the end of the meeting

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) gala dinner.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers and host broadcaster coverage of official arrivals
